001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2;
003
004import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpException;
005import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpHeaders;
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
007
008public class AuthException extends ApiHttpException {
009    public AuthException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers) {
010        this(statusCode, body, headers, null, null);
011    }
012
013    public AuthException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers, final String message) {
014        super(statusCode, body, headers, message, null);
015    }
016
017    public AuthException(final int statusCode, final String body, final ApiHttpHeaders headers, final String message,
018            final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
019        super(statusCode, body, headers, message, response);
020    }
021}
